experience.title: Digital Intern
experience.description: • Explored the different types of  synthetic data generation techniques for healthcare fraud • Performed exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and SMOTE to deal with imbalance in the training dataset• Applied GANs, Gretel Synthesis, and Synthetic Data Vault libraries to improve F1-Score using Synthetic Data

experience.title: Computer Vision Software Development Intern
experience.description: • Worked on developing various modules for automatically detecting and segmenting microscopic particles.• Developed a code for the detection of metallic grains and calculation of properties of grains like size and area• Develop a code for the dust correction in microscopic using the threshold and inpaint function of OpenCV

experience.title: Affiliate
experience.description: •Worked under the Dean of International Relations for positioning and branding of IIT Kharagpur as a Global leader in science and technology.•Played a Pivotal role in organizing the 69th Foundation day of IIT Kharagpur, managing 100+ students from 15 different schools.•Worked on the UG Achiever Directory 2018-2019 which showcases the achievements of IIT KGP students in the field of sports, arts, and academia.•Facilitate communication with 300+ schools of Karnataka for Young Innovators Program (All India Level Innovation Competition)
